channel.title: P.O.H.'s glitches
channel.description:
ok i found out another glitch, well the armour (kites nd full helms (Rune)) could be worn by lvl 1 defences.... just as i found out i was getting my crafting to lvl 43 (To make shields) to put on my lvl 3 account.... but just as i was doing that system update came along and jagex changed it... another glitch was that when u were in a boxing ring you could teleport out to say varrock and then attack anyone their, mods were their telling people to bank all their stuff and run away, i never saw this but my mate was telling me about it and is giving me the link to it later. edit - here is the link, the music is v good, and its a very cool video. http://rapidshare.de/files/22324118/durialhaxes.wmv.html
the last major glitch i know of was that u can sit in a chair and drop anything, and it wil land on ure head, but jagex later fixed this (i got lots of screenies of it tho, as u will see).... anymore glitches feel free to post
[URL=http://i72.imagethrust.com/images/fYU/view-image/the-human-watering-can.html][IMG]http://i72.imagethrust.com/t/61436/thehumanwateringcan.jpg[/img][/URL] ok so sorry its so small, i beleive if u click on it then it shud inlarge. post youre weird things on youre head.... buckets.... funny thing was my mate dropped his dark cav on one chair then went and sat in another... it looked like a ghost was sitting in the other chair, ill post it soon. post pictures.
ghost: [URL=http://i72.imagethrust.com/images/fYZ/view-image/ghostly.html][IMG]http://i72.imagethrust.com/t/61441/ghostly.jpg[/img][/URL]
me and my friend always just sit in my house chattin about stuff, get my maid to make us sum pizza... bla bla bla then we discoverd u could drop crap on youre head, here is us : [URL=http://i72.imagethrust.com/images/fYY/view-image/frigginweirdos.html][IMG]http://i72.imagethrust.com/t/61440/frigginweirdos.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: P.O.H.'s glitches
item.dc:creator: @zsakul2 zsakul2
item.description:
@zsakul2 wrote:

man sorry yall i’ve been absent,i found a new glitch in c war sorry if this is off topic but when i went into the respawn room came out went 1 stair up logged out for like 10 seconds logged back in i was at the very top of c wars and it said you have 2 minutes to leave the respawn room and it kicked me from c wars cause i wasn’t in it lol

Read full topic

item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

yeah that would be awsome, i would play runescape on runescape, then i would get double xp!!!

woot that would be sweet, plus my guy would be a lazy bum, then there gonna add a mom that yells at you for spending so long on the pc then your gonna have to take out the trash and shit, so let just stick with the pc so i can own the noobs in rs on my pc in rs

actually if you get to like level 75 construct you can summon steel dragons nad when you kill them you get dragon legs somewere there was a pic of it and it really works you can summon like 5 and kill them and get the legs… :eek: :eek:
